text: `+` didn't do the trick, unfortunately. It should be noted that `isfile` with an `S3Path` that points directly to an object in that prefix _does_ work with the space.

text: I’m not sure the full context here but be careful with `isfile`, it can return true for various reasons other than the path exists and a file lives there, ref <https://github.com/JuliaCloud/AWSS3.jl/issues/127>
